00020 Bool mci_direction = CW; 
00021 Bool mci_run_stop = FALSE;    
00022 U8 mci_ref_speed = 0;

00028 extern Bool overcurrent;

00030 
00036 void mci_run(void)
00037 {
00038   if (!(PCTL & (1<<PRUN))) /* if there is an overcurrent */
00039   {
00040     PSC_Init();
00041   }
00042   overcurrent = FALSE;
00043   mci_run_stop = TRUE;
00044   mc_regulation_loop();
00045   mc_duty_cycle(mc_get_duty_cycle());
00046   mc_switch_commutation(mc_get_hall());
00047   mc_disable_during_inrush(); /* disable overcurrent during inrush */
00048 }
00049 
00055 void mci_retry_run(void)
00056 {
00057   mci_run_stop = TRUE;
00058   mc_regulation_loop();
00059   mc_duty_cycle(mc_get_duty_cycle());
00060   mc_switch_commutation(mc_get_hall());
00061   mc_disable_during_inrush(); /* disable overcurrent during inrush */
00062 }
00063 
00069 Bool mci_motor_is_running(void)
00070 {
00071   return mci_run_stop;
00072 }
00073 
00080 void mci_stop(void)
00081 {
00082   mci_run_stop=FALSE;
00083 }
00084 
00091 void mc_init()
00092 {
00093   mc_init_HW();
00094   Enable_interrupt();
00095 
00096   mci_stop();
00097   mci_forward();
00098   mci_set_ref_speed(0);
00099   mc_set_measured_speed(0);
00100 }

00188 void mci_store_measured_current(U16 current)
00189 {
00190   mci_measured_current = ((63*mci_measured_current)+(64*current))>>6;
00191 }
